sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It's Thursday, the 30th of June. Good morning, Europe. A very warm welcome to the program. Let's take a look at our top stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian authorities confirmed that 144 military personnel have been released from captivity in Russia in what is believed to be the largest prisoner swap since the war began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: NATO commits to a major overhaul and embraces a new strategic concept based on a direct threat from Russia as the U.S. increases its military presence in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: And 20 suspects of the November 2015 Paris attacks receive sentences for their role in the massacre.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Salah Abdeslam gets France's toughest sentence of full life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's military intelligence has published video claiming to show the exchange of prisoners between Ukraine and Russia. President Volodymyr Zelensky has confirmed that 144 Ukrainian military personnel have been released from Russian captivity as part of a prisoner swap. The exchange is the largest since the war began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: I'd like to tell my close ones that I'll come back to them soon. Honestly, I'm overwhelmed with emotions, but it was very hard to drive because it's another attempt to come back home and it didn't work out before. All the time during the journey, I was thinking that it would fail, go wrong and we'd return to captivity of the ukrainian prisoners freed 95 were involved in defending the azovstal steel plant in mariopol and many of them have serious injuries including burns and amputations the exchange saw an equal number of soldiers released by each side.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, at least four people were reportedly killed and five wounded by a Russian missile

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: strike on a residential building in Ukraine's southern city of Mykolaiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The four-story building was partly destroyed by the attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Moscow has admitted to the strike on the city but said its forces had hit what it called a training base for foreign mercenaries in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: NATO country leaders were charged their cultural batteries at the Prado Museum ahead of the final day of a momentous summit in Madrid. They have already expanded the alliance by two, formally inviting Sweden and Finland to their number and they have committed themselves to a major overhaul of NATO's military mission. So today leaders have endorsed NATO's new strategic concept Det er et nytt strategisk konsept. Det er publisert når vi snakker.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Dette er det nye strategiske konseptet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Det nye ble sammenlignet i 2010.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Dette er veldig annerledes enn det vi sammenlignet i forrige gang.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Det gjør det klart at Russland har den mest viktige og direkte fordelen til vår sikkerhet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: poses the most significant and direct threat to our security.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Along with pledging support for Ukraine in its fight against Russia for as long as it takes, NATO is strengthening its eastern flank, transforming the NATO response force, while the U.S. has also agreed to ramp up its military presence in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the leaders of Sweden, Finland, Norway, Denmark and Iceland have been reflecting on NATO's new-look Nordic Bloc.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We have to keep in mind that Finland has, during decades, and specifically during the last decade, been building up cooperation, enhanced partnership with NATO, bilateral cooperation with the USA, with the UK.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Russia's actions have dominated the summit, but the alliance is also looking to other directions too, namely what it calls the systemic challenges posed by the People's Republic of China.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It means while NATO is set to expand membership, it also looks to reinforcing partnerships with non-NATO countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It's been a long time coming. Twenty suspects in France's biggest terrorism trial have been convicted and sentenced in a Paris court. Salah Abdeslam, the only survivor

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: of the group that carried out coordinated attacks in Paris in 2015, was found guilty of murder and sentenced to full life in prison, the toughest sentence available under French law. Of the other defendants besides Abdeslam, 18 were given various terrorism-related convictions and one was convicted on a lesser fraud charge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Some were given life sentences, others walked free after being sentenced to time served.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Survivors and victims' families emerged from the packed courtroom, dazed and exhausted after an excruciating nine-month trial that's been crucial in their quest for justice and closure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The range of sentences shows that the sentences were made for each individual as it should be.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: What is important is that for us we had a trial that is memorable, I would say of very good content both in terms of justice and in terms of the possibility for everyone to express themselves. Je dirais que c'est un très bon contenu, en termes de justice et de possibilité pour que tout le monde s'exprime.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Je suis satisfait de la sentence et je pense que, comme beaucoup de gens, c'est vrai.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: On ne devrait pas exagérer, on ne devrait pas demander plus, mais je pense que ça a été fait en accord avec la loi et c'est bien.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: been done in accordance with the law and that is good. On Monday I'm going back to work. I think it's going to take a few long weeks to get back on track, to move on and to analyze what I've just experienced. But really, there's a need to get back to normal life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The 2015 gun and bomb attacks on bars, restaurants, the National Football Stadium and the Bataclan Music Venue left 130 people dead and saw hundreds more injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It was the worst attack in France since World War II.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: This is the third and last day of the historic NATO summit here in Madrid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Why is it historic? But for many reasons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: First of all, on Wednesday, NATO alliance formally invited Sweden and Finland to join the alliance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: These two long neutral Nordic countries, which are going to finally join the alliance after Turkey dropped its opposition to their beats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This brings the alliance from the 30 to 32 members, and it also shows how Russia's war in Ukraine is transforming regional security. The United States President Joe Biden announced that he's going to increase United States military presence in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: He also announced that he's going to set permanent headquarters of his U.S.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Fifth Army Corps in Poland, a move that Vladimir Putin was opposed to for years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In the end, this transformation, this transformative summit, as the Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said even before the summit, is also reflected in the new strategic concept of the alliance for the next decade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: For the first time, Russia is defined as the most significant and direct threat for the alliance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And for the first time as well, the challenges set by China are also literally written in this concept, which means that actually the strategic competition between great powers is back.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And this, of course, shows that what Macron was saying in 2019 about the brain death of NATO alliance belongs to the past.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Efikou Tsakousta for Euronews, Madrid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Costa for Euronews Madrid. Disgraced R&B superstar R. Kelly has been sentenced to 30 years in jail for racketeering and sex trafficking crimes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The 55-year-old was convicted nine months ago for leading a decades-long effort to recruit and trap teenagers and women for sex.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This is a significant outcome for all victims of R. Kelly and especially for the survivors who so bravely testified about the horrific and sadistic abuse they endured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: R. Kelly is a predator.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I started this journey 30 years ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I was 14 years old when I encountered Robert Sylvester Kelly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: There wasn't a day in my life up until this moment that I actually believed that the judicial system would come through for black and brown girls. Kelly's conviction in New York was widely seen as a milestone for the Me Too movement. It was the first major sex abuse trial where the majority of accusers were black women. Kelly's lawyer says they will appeal against the length of the sentence.
